column2: Six Months Later Some People Still Have The Sadz
column5: It's been six months since the election and the ouster of the Orange Shitgibbon.  Put some people can't or won't get over it: The one time leader of the free world who now lives alone in a hotel sharing buffets common areas and staff with strangers yearns for attention and relevance so badly he now stands on a patio step every night ranting to tens of people about a 6 month old election that he lost pic.twitter.com/xIuZ7jAkZD â€” Mystery Solvent (@MysterySolvent) April 30 2021 He's not the only one with the sadz either including his BFF and boss from the other side of the world:  Open thread below...
